mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name, rp.p_id, p.category FROM sys_role a, sys_role_permission rp, sys_permission p WHERE a.id = rp.role_id AND rp.p_id=p.id
SELECT a.id, a.name, rp.p_id, p.category FROM sys_role a LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON a.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.p_id = p.id WHERE a.id=#{id}
